com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowLooper

java.lang.Object
  com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows.ShadowLooper

@Implements(value=android.os.Looper.class)
public class ShadowLooper
extends java.lang.Object

Shadow for Looper that enqueues posted Runnables to be run (on this thread) later. Runnables that are scheduled to run immediately can be triggered by calling idle() todo: provide better support for advancing the clock and running queued tasks

pauseMainLooper

public static void pauseMainLooper()

unPauseMainLooper

public static void unPauseMainLooper()

idle

public void idle()
Causes Runnables that have been scheduled to run immediately to actually run. Does not advance the scheduler's clock;

idle

public void idle(long intervalMillis)
Causes Runnables that have been scheduled to run within the next intervalMillis milliseconds to run while advancing the scheduler's clock.

Parameters:
intervalMillis - milliseconds to advance

runToEndOfTasks

public void runToEndOfTasks()
Causes all of the Runnables that have been scheduled to run while advancing the scheduler's clock to the start time of the last scheduled Runnable.

runToNextTask

public void runToNextTask()
Causes the next Runnable(s) that have been scheduled to run while advancing the scheduler's clock to its start time. If more than one Runnable is scheduled to run at this time then they will all be run.

runOneTask

public void runOneTask()
Causes only one of the next Runnables that have been scheduled to run while advancing the scheduler's clock to its start time. Only one Runnable will run even if more than one has ben scheduled to run at the same time.

post

public void post(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                 long delayMillis)
Enqueue a task to be run later.

Parameters:
runnable - the task to be run
delayMillis - how many milliseconds into the (virtual) future to run it

pause

public void pause()

unPause

public void unPause()

reset

public void reset()
Causes all enqueued tasks to be discarded

getScheduler

public Scheduler getScheduler()
Returns the Scheduler that is being used to manage the enqueued tasks.

Returns:
the Scheduler that is being used to manage the enqueued tasks.
